metadata.title: CVE-2024-26978 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: serial:max310x: fix NULL pointer dereference in I2C instantiation When trying toinstantiate a max14830 device from userspace: echo max14830 0x60 >/sys/bus/i2c/devices/i2c-2/new_device we get the following error: Unable tohandle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address... ... Calltrace: max310x_i2c_probe+0x48/0x170 [max310x] i2c_device_probe+0x150/0x2a0... Add check for validity of devtype to prevent the error, and abort probewith a meaningful error message.
